project.name: C-C088A-SUBV-01-ST03-DT05-DF15-CF19-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C088A-SUBV-01-ST03-DT05-DF15-CF19-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository Read a string from the input. Perform a find path -iname input.If input contains arguments such as -exec with a \; ending the command, a user can insert other commands instead of just find

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="$(echo ImZpbGUuKiI= | base64 --decode)" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C088A-SUBV-01-ST03-DT05-DF15-CF19-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: commit a file Read a string from the input. Perform a find path -iname input.If input contains arguments such as -exec with a \; ending the command, a user can insert other commands instead of just find

process.script: cd ../good-02 && cp file.txt stonesoup && cd stonesoup && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/svn add file.txt

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="filename.txt" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: CHECKOUT AND ADD AND COMMIT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
